#summary File issues on Github

= Issues =

If you find any problems or would like to suggest improvements, please 

 * verify that the issue still exists with the latest release 
 * create a sample project that shows the problem or otherwise provide a way to replicate the problem
 * ideally fix the issue and send pull requests

All issues are filed on Github at

https://github.com/jayway/maven-android-plugin/issues

We used to track issues here on Google code, but have closed all issues as wont fix and migrated to github.
